days.focus: Decode Ohm's/Kirchhoff laws with AI co-pilots

hours.title: Decode Ohm's/Kirchhoff laws with AI co-pilots (Segment 1/4)
hours.description: Work through daily voltage/current/power drills in Notion (Concept → Formula → MCU tie-in) while using Codex to produce quick C calculators for sanity checks.
hours.ai_prompt: Generate a C utility that solves Kirchhoff loop equations given resistor arrays and expected rail voltages.

hours.title: Pipeline & memory map explorations (Segment 1/4)
hours.description: CRITICAL for L476RG: The L4 series starts at 4MHz MSI. Learn to configure PLL to boost to 80MHz. Wrong clock = wrong UART baud/timing.
